name: Ecollapse
description:
Resume

The damage of the climate change is irreversible. The only thing you can do now is delay the inevitable. Try to delay the unavoidable as long as possible, while keeping the stability of the planet

Use the fire to heat the planet and lower the sea level, or use the water to rise it. The leaf allows to create new forest on the earth.

Credits

Andrea Marco - Artist

Daniel Robledo - Programmer

Resources Music

"In orbit" by Electronic Sense of https://pixabay.com

SFX

"Waterfall, Small, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Videogame developed in a period of 72 hours for the Ludum Dare.
